roleset.name: separation into 2 diametrically opposed units

role.descr: first side or whole thing polarized

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: the two major political parties had long begun their polarization from one another

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: The Vietnam War and Its Polarization of American Society

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, polarize.01. Corresponds to VNcls other_cos-45.4
